question: On which riverbanks is the center of Uppsala, Sweden located?
true_answer: The center is located on both banks of the Fyris River (Fyrisån)
asked_question_translated: Su quali sponde del fiume si trova il centro di Uppsala, in Svezia?
answer: Il centro di Uppsala, in Svezia, si trova principalmente sulla sponda occidentale del fiume Fyrisån.
answer_translated_eng: The centre of Uppsala, Sweden, is mainly located on the west bank of the river Fyrisån.
